data.name: Ruins of Majika
data.detailed_description:
A dungeon roaming action role-playing game in a hack-and-slash adventure. filled with epic loot, levels, boss battles, and a horde of enemies

Choose the character that best suits your playstyle from a variety of options. Each character has unique characteristics and appearances to set your hero apart.

Explore Hirang's numerous hub towns and wide overworld. Discover the reasons why there are unique individuals, heroes like you who can wield and harness the power of magic, by engaging in battle through day and night, deep forests and caves, and exploration of the valleys and mountains around the area. Kill the monsters that have plagued the region ever since the mighty Kora kingdom was destroyed.

A great challenge lies ahead. Strengthen your hero, gather treasure, level up, and empower yourself with fabled armors and weapons that are thought to be so strong that many people have tried to discover them but failed. Nobody truly knew until you arrived. The chosen one.

An enigmatic figure who rules the territory around each region guards it. Kill these monsters to get gold and materials you can use to equip stronger armor and weapons. Hunt increasingly more dangerous beasts while utilizing everything at your disposal.

data.short_description: A dungeon roaming action-adventure role-playing game in a hack-and-slash filled with epic loot, levels, boss fights, and hordes of enemies.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3, 2.4 Ghz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GT 240 or equivalent, minimum 512 MB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
